description: Students study selected writers of the Eastern Caribbean islands of Barbados, Trinidad, Saint Lucia and others. The study of literature is supplemented by guest lectures and speakers, as well as field trips to sites of cultural and environmental interest. Accommodation includes stays in private homes. Prerequisite: FYW. Offered in alternate years during Interim.
name: Lit Eastern Caribbean
notes: You will find this course listed in Studio Abroad under its course title.
prerequisites: FYW. Offered in alternate years during Interim.

title: Literature of the Eastern Caribbean
